name: The Path (itch) (Florin Pain)
description:
Short RPG featuring an alternative universe, where the land of Europe is ruled by an immortal Emperor. The dynasty is threatened by Sand-People, the rulers of the land situated at the southern border of the Empire. After a successful campaign at the southern border, where the Emperor conquer a Sand-People Fort and kidnapped the Fort Master, the Emperor retreated back in his seat at his Castle. But this campaign had consequences that forced the Emperor to summon his son, Avalon, for a secret mission behind enemy lines, in order to avoid a war.

In this game you can play as Avalon, the son of the Emperor. You are summoned at the castle for a mission. Halfway to the throne room you find hidden enemies inside the castle and you are forced to wipe them out. After getting the mission, you find yourself at the castle’s door that are under siege. A small force of Sand-People is attacking the castle. Your mission to reach the ship still stands, but you have to help your men repel the attack on your way to the ship.

In this game you can enjoy advanced physics, ragdolls, AI driven NPCs (friends or foes), various interactions, attack blocking mechanic and powerful skills that can wreak havoc on enemies.

This game has been made in May 2019 for a University coursework. The version presented here at this moment is the same version that was submitted. I am aware of some bugs and problems and when the time will allow me, I will patch all the known bugs.

This game should run at 60+ FPS. You can enjoy this game in browser but please consider downloading the game to enjoy it at full performances if you encounter low frame rate in browser version (the browser version is limited to browser capabilities).

Enjoy the game and have fun with ragdolls!
